english.segment2: Who, O Lord could save themselves, Their own soul could heal?. Out shame was deeper than the sea;. Your grace is deeper still
english.segment4: And You alone can rescue. You alone can save. You alone can lift us from the grave. You came down to find us, Led us out of death. To You alone belongs the highest praise
english.segment6: You, O Lord, have made a way, The great divide You healed. For when our hearts were far away, Your love went further still. Yes, Your love goes further still
english.segment8: And You alone can rescue. You alone can save. You alone can lift us from the grave. You came down to find us, Led us out of death. To You alone belongs the highest praise. To You alone belongs the highest praise. To You alone belongs the highest praise
english.segment10: We lift up our eyes, lift up our eyes. Youre the giver of life. We lift up our eyes, lift up our eyes. Youre the giver of life. We lift up eyes, Lift up our eyes. youre the giver of life. We lift up our eyes, lift up our eyes, ( to chorus 2 ). Youre the giver of life
